page.title: 18 LIFE STYLES
page.content: {A Day in the Life of a Schoolboy aged {11 At 7.00a.m.I get up and get ready for school and have my breakfast. Then I cycle to the bus-stop to catch the school bus at 8.00. We start school at 9.00. This morning I had a Maths lesson until break and then an English lesson from break until lunchtime. I ate my lunch at school as it would take too long to go home for lunch. After lunch I had Science and then an art lesson. We finished school at 3.30 and after a ride in the school bus I collected my bike and cycled home. When I got home I did my homework and watched T.V., had my tea and I went out to play at 6.00p.m..I always play out if it is fine until about 7.00p.m. I go to bed at 8.00 p.m.
